          <title>
            <string language="en">Reversible reactions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umschaltbare Reaktionen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réactions réversibles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reações reversíveis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Reazioni reversibili</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντιστρέψιμες αντιδράσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reacciones reversibles</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows the reversible reaction of a change in colour for a litmus solution with the addition of either an acid or an alkali.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">addition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">alkalis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reactions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">colour</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">litmus solution</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reversible reactions</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die umschaltbare Reaktion 
einer Änderung in der Farbe für eine Lackmuslösung mit der 
Hinzufügung entweder einer Säure oder des Alkalis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre la réaction réversible d'un
changement de couleur pour une solution de tournesol avec l'ajout d'un
acide ou d'un alcali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra a reação reversível de 
uma mudança na cor para uma solução do litmus com a adição de um 
ácido ou de um alcalóide.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra la reazione reversibile di 
un cambiamento a colori per una soluzione del tornasole con l'aggiunta
di un acido o di un alcali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει αντιστρέψιμη αντίδραση 
μιας αλλαγής στο χρώμα για μια litmus λύση με την προσθήκη 
είτε ενός οξέος είτε ενός αλκαλίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra la reacción reversible de 
un cambio en el color para una solución del tornasol con la adición 
de un ácido o de un álcali.</string>
          </description>
